lexUnit.name: commendation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a statement of formal praise

sentence.text: The 1992 DESK project resulted in a commendation by the Scottish Accident Prevention Council in recognition of the Group 's contribution to raising child safety awareness in schools .
